name: Heroic Story
long_description: We're building an AI-powered engine focused on transforming storytelling and creator economics. Backed by industry-leading minds in entertainment, gaming, and technology, our diverse team excels at merging narrative intelligence with business strategy. Our co-founders are a dynamic duo of brothers who have shipped VR games, built virtual influencers on Twitch, and launched popular entertainment across all media including film and television. During the multibillion-dollar online poker boom of the 2000s, our CEO was one of the top no-limit hold'em players in the world.
